description: Put a twist on shepherd's pie with creamy mashed sweet potato. Gold sweet potato adds a hint of sweetness and a pop of colour to this mouth-watering dish.
name: Sweet Potato Shepherd's Pie Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Spoon mixture into a 16 x 30cm (6cm deep) baking dish. Top with mash and spread to cover. Sprinkle over remaining cheese. Bake for 20 minutes or until cheese has melted and lamb mixture is bubbling around edges. Stand for 10 minutes. Serve sprinkled with parsley.
